channel.title: Questions
channel.description: 1: after killing an NPC makes it teleport you... 2: after killing a boss monster you get a key for a shop... 3: use the key on the chest at a shop 4: you get 45m and a darkbow

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

well, where to put them I cant really tell you because I want people to learn, but ill give you most of these codes that I can.

(Im writing the codes rigth now and Ill modify this post when there done.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2008, 11:34:47 pm[/size][hr]Teleporting NPC- When you kill it you tele

[code] if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPC ID) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = XXXX; // Change coordinates
                            ppl.teleportToY = YYYY; // Change coordinates
                        }[/code]

Lazy to rite the rest cuz its 3a.m. but Ill get up at 8 and write the rest c ya then ;D
~.Tony.~
